REUTERS.UNKNOWN: V RM f1610 reute b f BC-/-FED-SETS-TWO-BILLIO 03-26 0057

TEXT.TITLE: FED SETS TWO BILLION DLR CUSTOMER REPURCHASE
TEXT.BODY: The Federal Reserve entered the U.S. government securities market to arrange two billion dlrs of customer repurchase agreements, a spokeswoman for the New York Fed said. Federal funds were trading at 6-3/16 pct at the time of the indirect injection of temporary reserves. Reuter
